from_label: Problem:Lists have a very simple method to insert elements:a = [1,2,3,4]a.insert(2,66)print a[1, 2, 66, 3, 4]For a numpy array I could do:a = np.asarray([1,2,3,4])a_l = a.tolist()a_l.insert(2,66)a = np.asarray(a_l)print a[1 2 66 3 4]but this is very convoluted.Is there an insert equivalent for numpy arrays?A:import numpy as npa = np.asarray([1,2,3,4])pos = 2element = 66a = ... # put solution in this variableBEGIN SOLUTION
